summary: Very simple mod that replaces the annoying bread crunching sound that permeates inns with a brief clip of silence.
descriptionHtml:
This mod just replaces the bread crunching sound with a brief clip of silence.  I found instructions online a long time ago for replacing sound files and made this as the bread crunching was very annoying.  I can no longer remember where I saw the tutorial on removing sounds.  I figured I would upload this to save someone else the time.

Even though I originally made this for Skyrim, I have used it on SkyrimVR and it works fine.  Since SkyrimVR is modified from Special Edition, this should be fine for SE also.

Just unzip into your Skyrim directory and overwrite the files.  No ESP/ESM is used.
author: notepad
